alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Madison; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:26AM EST until January 17 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Madison, Southern Oneida and Chenango counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Light precipitation will begin as a wintry mix including freezing rain. Precipitation will change to rain as warmer air moves in, but glazing may continue a little longer as ground temperatures will lag behind air temperatures.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
